meanings.definition: A type of medication used to treat seizures and anxiety disorders.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed clonazepams to help control the patient's seizures.
meanings.sent2: She always carries her clonazepams with her in case of an anxiety attack.
meanings.sent3: The clonazepams decided to have a party in the medicine cabinet.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a storm, but the clonazepams were the calm in the center.
meanings.sent5: The bottle of clonazepams gleamed like a beacon of relief on the shelf.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'clonazepam', referring to multiple doses of the medication.
meanings.sent1: He took two clonazepams after dinner to help him sleep.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacy had run out of clonazepams, so she had to wait for the next shipment.
meanings.sent3: The clonazepams in the bottle whispered to each other, 'Who will be chosen next?'
meanings.sent4: The clonazepams were like tiny soldiers, ready to battle anxiety and seizures.
meanings.sent5: The clonazepams danced in the palm of her hand, promising relief from worry.
